description: Detects execution of rundll32 where the DLL being called is stored in an Alternate Data Stream (ADS).
author: Harjot Singh
'@cyb3rjy0t'
name: Potential Rundll32 Execution With DLL Stored In ADS
query: (process.executable.text:*\\rundll32.exe AND (process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/R/ OR process.command_line.text:/r/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/U/ OR process.command_line.text:/u/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/N/ OR process.command_line.text:/n/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/D/ OR process.command_line.text:/d/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/L/ OR process.command_line.text:/l/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/L/ OR process.command_line.text:/l/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/ OR process.command_line.text:/3/ OR process.command_line.text:/2/ OR process.command_line.text:/./ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/w/ OR process.command_line.text:/:/ OR process.command_line.text:/./ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/:/))
